### Frequently Asked Questions
### What is Hatch?
Hatch is an AI CSR platform that enables businesses to generate and manage one-to-one, revenue-driving conversations at scale. With fully custom AI CSRs natively integrated with your lead sources and CRM, you can use targeted campaigns to increase conversion across your funnel while decreasing overhead costs. Turn conversations into revenue with Hatch.
### How does Hatch AI work?
Hatch AI allows you to build custom AI agents that converse with your contacts over text, phone, and email.
Each bot has a name, a personality, a business profile to reference, and a directive (like to qualify leads, book appointments, or follow up on quotes). You then give it a series of instructions, called prompts, on how to complete that directive. Finally, you set rules so the bot knows when to transfer to a human, how to handle objections, and when to part ways with a contact.
### Do I need to be tech-savvy to use Hatch AI?
Nope. Hatch AI does not require any coding or complex setups. All of the prompts and instructions you give are in plain language, like "Ask the customer what day and time works best for them." 
Keep in mind also that:
  * The bot builder has a sandbox to test changes before going live.
  * We offer best-practice templates.
  * You'll get a white-glove onboarding with ongoing dedicated support.


### Can I really trust a bot to interact with my customers?
Sure can. Your bot will follow your prompts and rules so that it behaves exactly as you want, and you'll have a test conversation window right in the bot builder so you can test out refinements before going live. 
And as we mentioned above, you'll have the tools and human guidance to make sure you've set it up properly.
You might like to know that our customers are now using bot conversation transcripts to train their humans—they're  _that_ effective.
### What does it mean that Hatch uses "generative AI"?
Generative AI is AI that can come up with its own content. So while prescriptive AI takes existing data and makes suggestions, such as “Follow up with this customer,” generative AI can actually come up with the actual follow up message for the customer. And Hatch AI takes that a step further: your bots will text customers for you and hold authentic conversations with them.

**Company Overview: Hatch**

Founded in 2018 and hailing from Richmond, VA, Hatch is disrupting the way contact centers engage with their customers through a powerful SMS business messaging platform. Recognized as part of Y Combinator's Winter 2019 batch, the company has swiftly grown to employ 73 people, bringing innovative communication solutions to various industries.

**Mission & Product Offering**
Hatch is all about empowering contact centers to conduct revenue-driving conversations at scale. Their mission revolves around transforming SMS communication, making it easier for businesses to connect with customers beyond traditional channels. Their platform not only automates text messaging but also provides reporting tools, templates, and more to enhance customer interactions.

**Key Features & Solutions**
Hatch offers a range of features designed to optimize customer engagement:
- **Automated Messaging:** Proactively reach out via text, email, and voicemail, ensuring no lead falls through the cracks.
- **Templates & Reporting:** A library of templates helps standardize messaging, while robust reporting reveals how conversations translate into revenue.
- **Integrations:** Seamlessly connects with popular CRMs and lead sources, ensuring your communications are integrated and efficient.

With Hatch, businesses can fuel every stage of their sales funnel, from initial outreach to securing reviews. Notable industries served include home services, healthcare, finance, and more.

**Backed by Strong Partnerships**
Under the guidance of Michael Seibel, a prominent Group Partner at Y Combinator, Hatch has established itself as a trusted platform for over 1,000 businesses. Their success stories showcase a tangible ROI, with customers reporting significant revenue growth.

**Why Choose Hatch?**
The standout feature of Hatch is its AI-driven customer service representatives (CSRs) that are capable of handling high volumes of conversations. This ensures immediate responses, accurate information, and 24/7 availability, allowing human agents to focus on complex tasks that require a personal touch.

**Conclusion**
In a landscape where effective communication drives success, Hatch positions itself as a key player in the SaaS and B2B sectors, revolutionizing how contact centers manage their customer relationships. If you're looking to turn conversations into revenue while reducing operational costs, Hatch is worth a closer look. For more information, visit [usehatchapp.com](http://usehatchapp.com).

--- 

That's the essence of Hatch—a company aimed at making SMS communication smarter and more efficient for contact centers. They’re not just selling software; they’re propelling businesses into a new era of customer engagement.
